title: Ticket #4801: Note that notification setting in submit file can be overridden in DAG
description: Based on today's question on htcondor-users, I'm wondering whether the condor_submit man page should note that the notification setting can be overridden by the DAGMAN_SUPPRESS_NOTIFICATION for DAG node jobs.
remarks:
2014-Dec-30 10:54:32 by wenger:
Maybe also mention this in the DAGMan chapter of the manual?
check_ins: 2015-Feb-26 13:38   Check-in [43465]: doc, including index entries for #4801 (By Karen Miller )
creator: wenger
